Users

  • {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}
    • import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {UserService} from "../../service/user.service"; import {User} from "../../model/user"; import {AxiosService} from "../../axios.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent implements OnInit { users: User[] = []; constructor(private userService: UserService, private axiosService: AxiosService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.axiosService.request( "GET", "/users/findAllUsers" ).then( (response) ) } getUsers(): void { this.userService.getUsers() .subscribe(users => this.users = users); } }
